data.prayer: Father, you know every soul, and you know who are yours and who are yet to be yours out of the 5,000 people living in Grevenmacher, Luxembourg. Please, call your lost sheep to yourself.
data.verse: For I will take you out of the nations; I will gather you from all the countries and bring you back into your own land.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Grevenmacher, Luxembourg
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, please start new house churches in every neighborhood of the state of Grevenmacher.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord as the waters cover the sea.

data.section_summary: On average, 3 babies will be born in the next month to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Grevenmacher, Luxembourg.
data.prayer: Lord, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, see the suffering of your people in the state of Grevenmacher. Deliver all those who have not forgotten your Word.
data.verse: Look on my suffering and deliver me, for I have not forgotten your law.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage those who are afraid in Grevenmacher, Luxembourg that you are the healer and you are the Savior.
data.verse: Heal me, Lord, and I will be healed; save me and I will be saved, for you are the one I praise.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Junglinster
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Junglinster, Grevenmacher, Luxembourg.
Spirit, inspire new kinds of evangelism through social media in Grevenmacher, Luxembourg.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist, discharge all the duties of your ministry.

data.prayer: Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Grevenmacher, Luxembourg and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, make the 50 believers in Grevenmacher to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 4,950 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.
